title: How Krishna Relates Personally with Every Soul? | His Holiness Stoka Krishna Swami
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: He has a very specific relationship with each individual Jeeva.
segments.summary: Krishna has a unique and specific relationship with every living being, and we should be interested in understanding our own relationship with Him.

segments.key_quote: If He relates with me, it's not that He is absent in some other relationship.
segments.summary: Krishna's unlimited nature allows Him to have personal relationships with everyone without being limited or absent from other relationships, unlike in the material world.

segments.key_quote: So He was expanding into 16,108 forms.
segments.summary: Krishna's incarnation in Dwaraka with 16,108 queens illustrates His ability to expand into numerous forms and provide association to everyone.

segments.key_quote: Krishna is the only unlimited person.
segments.summary: Unlike anything in the material or even spiritual world, Krishna is the only unlimited being, while all other living entities are limited.

segments.key_quote: And He expands in those forms and relates with devotees for the sake of receiving their service.
segments.summary: As the unlimited person, Krishna has unlimited forms to relate with devotees and receive their loving service.
